short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The OmniCXM for Google Extension is an extended version of OmniCXM to click to call directly from the browser by using OmniCXM Users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OmniCXM for Google Extension is an extended version of OmniCXM. Users can click to call directly from the web browser when it detects the phone number format.
Users can also dial directly by entering a phone number from the dial pad to make a call and take notes.  The outcome calls, the noted information, and the recordings will be saved in the full version of OmniCXM.
